trans-unit.source: Navigation meshes
trans-unit.target: Navigation meshes

trans-unit.source: Beginner Level designer Programmer
trans-unit.target: Beginner Level designer Programmer

trans-unit.source: Navigation meshes form the area that entities with navigation components can navigate. Stride creates a layer in the navigation mesh for each navigation group you create.
trans-unit.target: Navigation meshes form the area that entities with navigation components can navigate. Stride creates a layer in the navigation mesh for each navigation group you create.

trans-unit.source: Game Studio displays navigation meshes as colored overlays in your scene. The overlay shows where entities in the navigation group for that layer can move. The mesh updates in real time as you edit your scene.
trans-unit.target: Game Studio displays navigation meshes as colored overlays in your scene. The overlay shows where entities in the navigation group for that layer can move. The mesh updates in real time as you edit your scene.

trans-unit.source: Create a navigation mesh
trans-unit.target: Create a navigation mesh

trans-unit.source: In the Asset View (bottom by default), click Add asset > Scenes > Navigation mesh.
trans-unit.target: In the Asset View (bottom by default), click Add asset > Scenes > Navigation mesh.

trans-unit.source: Select Game Settings asset
trans-unit.target: Select Game Settings asset

trans-unit.source: Game Studio adds a navigation mesh asset to your project.
trans-unit.target: Game Studio adds a navigation mesh asset to your project.

trans-unit.source: Navigation mesh asset
trans-unit.target: Navigation mesh asset

trans-unit.source: With the navigation mesh selected in the Asset View, in the Property Grid, set the scene the navigation meshes in this asset apply to.
trans-unit.target: With the navigation mesh selected in the Asset View, in the Property Grid, set the scene the navigation meshes in this asset apply to.

trans-unit.source: Set navigation mesh properties
trans-unit.target: Set navigation mesh properties

trans-unit.source: For more information about scenes, see Scenes.
trans-unit.target: For more information about scenes, see Scenes.

trans-unit.source: Under Selected groups, click Green plus button (Add).
trans-unit.target: Under Selected groups, click Green plus button (Add).

trans-unit.source: Game Studio adds a new item to the list of groups.
trans-unit.target: Game Studio adds a new item to the list of groups.

trans-unit.source: Add navigation group to navigation mesh
trans-unit.target: Add navigation group to navigation mesh

trans-unit.source: Click Blue arrow button (Replace) and choose a group from the drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: Click Blue arrow button (Replace) and choose a group from the drop-down menu.

trans-unit.source: Choose navigation group
trans-unit.target: Choose navigation group

trans-unit.source: Stride builds a layer in the navigation mesh for this group. For more information about groups, including how to create them, see Navigation groups.
trans-unit.target: Stride builds a layer in the navigation mesh for this group. For more information about groups, including how to create them, see Navigation groups.

trans-unit.source: Repeat steps 3 and 4 for as many groups as you want to use the navigation mesh.
trans-unit.target: Repeat steps 3 and 4 for as many groups as you want to use the navigation mesh.

trans-unit.source: !Note If you want to create a navigation mesh for a different scene, create another navigation mesh asset and select the scene in the asset properties.
trans-unit.target: !Note If you want to create a navigation mesh for a different scene, create another navigation mesh asset and select the scene in the asset properties.

trans-unit.source: Navigation mesh properties
trans-unit.target: Navigation mesh properties

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Scene
trans-unit.target: Scene

trans-unit.source: The scene this navigation mesh applies to
trans-unit.target: The scene this navigation mesh applies to

trans-unit.source: Included collision groups
trans-unit.target: Included collision groups

trans-unit.source: Set which collision groups the navigation mesh uses. By default, meshes use all collision groups
trans-unit.target: Set which collision groups the navigation mesh uses. By default, meshes use all collision groups

trans-unit.source: Build settings
trans-unit.target: Build settings

trans-unit.source: Advanced settings for the navigation mesh
trans-unit.target: Advanced settings for the navigation mesh

trans-unit.source: Groups
trans-unit.target: Groups

trans-unit.source: The groups that use this navigation mesh
trans-unit.target: The groups that use this navigation mesh

trans-unit.source: Show or hide a navigation mesh in the Scene Editor
trans-unit.target: Show or hide a navigation mesh in the Scene Editor

trans-unit.source: Use the navigation visibility menu in the Scene Editor toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Use the navigation visibility menu in the Scene Editor toolbar.

trans-unit.source: Navigation group visibility
trans-unit.target: Navigation group visibility

trans-unit.source: To show or hide layers belonging to different groups, use the checkboxes. The colored boxes indicate the color of the groups displayed in the Scene Editor.
trans-unit.target: To show or hide layers belonging to different groups, use the checkboxes. The colored boxes indicate the color of the groups displayed in the Scene Editor.

trans-unit.source: Navigation mesh hidden
trans-unit.target: Navigation mesh hidden

trans-unit.source: Navigation mesh shown
trans-unit.target: Navigation mesh shown

trans-unit.source: Bounding box shown
trans-unit.target: Bounding box shown

trans-unit.source: Bounding box hidden
trans-unit.target: Bounding box hidden

trans-unit.source: These options have no effect on runtime behavior.
trans-unit.target: These options have no effect on runtime behavior.
